content: Um jogo muito bom, mas por ser focado no combate deveria dar uma lista mais ampla de estilos de luta, como ataque  dist칙ncia, magias, itens auxiliares, etc. Se tivesse uma op칞칚o que fizesse a c칙mera apontar para o inimigo sem a necessidade de travar a mira nele (com a mira travada a movimenta칞칚o fica limitada) resolveria o problema da c칙mera.
GOOD GRIEF this is a MARVELOUS game in many ways. Also, unlike Animus Stand Alone, it's more BALANCED.

Nice game, reminds me of darksouls in pc console but as I play it further levels it gets difficult which is good but it gets boring too. I mean the environment is not open world its like MMORPG lmao. Any upcoming updates? Humor us devs, we supported so give us something new to ponder.

Very disappointing, game didn't hit my my expectation. Touchin the screen like analog on playstation is not accurate. I tried the first 5 quest and sometimes I'll start over and over not because I defeated by the enemy, it's because I lost the way. Need a button to make a light way shine again. The fight gameplay is not as good like Ire Blood Memory. I thought this is better. More like Darksouls but making Ireblood an offline game will be better than Animus I think. Please make this game better.
This game reminds me of dark souls It certainly is a lot like it it's bloody awesome

The game DESPERATELY needs some changes. The framerate drops to sickeningly unplayable levels, it's far too easy to make a mistake building your character and far too expensive to fix it, and the controls are garbage. Another game by the same devs, Ire: Blood Memory, is superior in every way and they should take some features from it. Make the menus less tedious, add an actual 'use' button, and optimize it for mobile gameplay- this runs smooth as sandpaper wrapped in steel wool and broken glass.
Very well made, enjoy it very much
Worked fine on my note 10, does not work on my pixel 3xl. Gives me a message saying I may not have bought the game which is inaccurate and insulting.
This game needs full Razer jungle cat support.
This game easy for first time游땕but after defeat story 2 times!!!it's kinda hell 游땴i stop play this Because the boss damn tooo hard!!!well whatever....this game just not for me to play....

I absolutely adore this game. Especially with a phone controller, this game requires little optimization when using a controller and once setup plays perfectly. I'm addicted to playing this game and it's so similar to Dark Souls I love it. Is it worth the money? Absolutely it's worth the money. I'm buying their other games because of how good this is. The controls work fine with touch controls but it's best played with a controller. It's great to play on the go and I can't recommend this enough.

Disappointing. Really not fun at all. Lack of story n adventure, battles suck, got bored n frustrated very quickly. It seems plenty of people like this game though. Strong word of advice: download the free version n try it first before u take a chance n pay for this game. Lesson learned. I uninstalled it already.

camera is too close its hard to see the enemy when you can only see the back of your character. and the view sensitivity is too sensitive even with the adjustments in the settings. hoping for your fast adjustments. tnx

Epic

Good game on mobile. To fully experience this game you want to maximize your performance by using a game pad, not just any game pad will do my friend you must get either a flydigi wee2 or wee2t because it emulates on screen controls. You can also get a touchroller which is basically a joystick for movement and you still use your fingers for everything else. If you have the game and have trouble with the onscreen controls then a gamepad is the way to go

Only played for a bit and it showed great potential but without game pad support the game was difficult to play.
Just amazing
Beautiful

For people who want to buy this game, is it worth the money? Yes definitely. It provides a fun and challenging experience. The only thing that i can say is the controls may be a tad bit clunky depending on your weapon in the game (heavier weapons are naturally hard to control) but that's just it. For a mobile game, it's definitely worth the experience, give it a try.
